item.title: Leopard Print Jacquard Cardigan
item.description: A YOOX purchase and a new favorite, this leopard print jacquard sweater is delicate and luxurious â€“ perfect for Spring and Summer as a colorful complement or on it’s own. I don’t usually wear V necklines but this one is just right. Jacquard fabrics, where patterns are woven instead of printed, have a much different feel than printed textiles and since the yarn is dyed before production there is less water used in the process to create the patterned print.
